description:
This burly little tool blends the function of a box cutter with a pocket prybar. By using replaceable box cutter blades in place of a knife, the Prybrid Utility tool keeps its footprint small without losing functionality. With a textured G10 handle this compact tool is easy to get a good grip on whether your cutting, prying, or celebrating a job well done with the bottle opener.

  • Uses replaceable box cutter blades available at most hardware stores
  • G10 handle has traction grooves to give you a secure grip
  • Integrated cord cutter and wire stripper
  • Bottle opener for celebrating a job well done
  • Prying end also has a groove for removing nails
  • Keyring hole lets you mount this compact tool on your keys
name: Gerber Prybrid-Utility Hybrid Tool
